fields.helloWorld: Hello World! My name is chappie, nice to meet you all! :sunglasses:
fields.farewell: Hey all, I'm leaving this guild... Nice to meet you people! :sob:
fields.about: Hey there! I am chappie, just a chatbot for Discord.
fields.wrongInput: What are you trying to say? :thinking:
fields.memberAdd: just joined... Welcome! come in and wash the dishes hehe regards :joy: :joy:
fields.help:
1. Type '!chappie say <your words>' and I will repeat.
2. Type '!chappie steam' to get news from Steam.
